::Aerotaur::
    "It seems that you are among other friends.  I will go now.  The three of 
you are welcome to come with me.  We have two youngsters in our group too."  
He sends a message to Windlord.  "Hey Windlord do you mind coming and guiding 
me to the new place?  I'll meet you in the clearing where the transmission 
originated."
